name: Story One in the Book of Mythologia (Demo)
name_original: Story One in the Book of Mythologia (Demo)
description:
Story one in a series of drama I am writing.  A tragic visual novel. I am planning on three stories in total.  This demo contains 99% of the first story. It's a demo because I am planning on improving the art. Current cover image is only a temporary choice. I have some CG ideas, too.  If you have art talent and want to join the team, please contact me at my twitter. This is a free project, but we can still negotiate. Estimated play time is 2-3 hours. The web version doesn't support save and load.

I noticed the web version has some static noise. Unfortunately, it's hard to find free and high quality music, so I don't think there is an easy way to fix that. (Also there is a file size requirement on itch lol.) The desktop ver doesn't have this issue. Desktop version is not published yet.  If you want a desktop version, you can contact me.

I might have missed a few audio credits. Please inform me if you think 

I missed your name.

This is a Visual Novel made with my own VN making tool:
